codes.code: p { color:red; font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; }
h1, h2, h3 { color:blue; font-weight:bold; } h3 { font-style:italic; }
div p { font-weight:bold; } div p h1 { font-style:italic; }
div > p { font-weight:bold; } div > p > h1 { font-style:italic; }
div + p { font-weight:bold; } div + p + h1 { font-style:italic; }
div ~ p { font-weight:bold; } /* div ~ p ~ h1 { font-style:italic; } */
* { margin: 0; padding: 0 } p * { font-style:italic; }
#menus { font-weight: bold; }
